Posts.Content: Is your oncologist aware of your problem with blood clots? I have known of pre-menopausal women being put on to either Letrozole or Anastrazole after taking Tamoxifen for two years. I am 62 and was put on Anastrazole after chemotherapy. Report
Posts.Title: Why can you not take Letrozole before the menopause

Posts.Content: This link leads to a page on the Macmillan website. It explains all about Ovary Ablation, a procedure that stops the ovaries from producing Oestrogen. The information might help you. http://www.macmillan.org.uk/Cancerinformation/Cancertypes/Breast/Treatingbreastcancer/Hormonaltherapies/Ovarianablation.aspx Report
Posts.Title: Why can you not take Letrozole before the menopause
